#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<math.h>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<limits.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll int gcd(ll int a,ll int b){if(a==0)return b;if(b==0)return a;if(a==1||b==1)return 1;
if(a==b)return a;if(a>b)return gcd(b,a%b);else return gcd(a,b%a);}
int main()
{
	int test;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		int i;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			int j=i;
			int sum=i;
			while(j)
			{
				sum+=j%10;
				j=j/10;
			}
			if(sum==n)
			{
				printf("%d\n",i);
				break;
			}
		}
		if(i==n)
			printf("NONE\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
